title: Theorycrafting - FULL TANK TWISTED FATE TOP LANE
body:
**Summoners**
Teleport
Flash/Ghost

**Runes**
ms quints
mpen reds
armor seals/hp level seals
mr blues/scaling mr blues
Cdr quints and/or gylphs - situational

**Skill order**
Max R, W, Q, E

**Build**
(these items may be situational, but can be used) 
Frozen heart, boots of lucidity, randumins omen, bansheeis veil, righteous glory, talisman of ascension, LICHBANE, thornmail, warmogs, sunfire.

**Your aim should be to get a minimum of 30cdr**

**Technique**
Good map awareness
Draw cards specific to that situation in a small time frame
Ability to last hit with succession
Surviving the early lane

**Strategy** 
Boots of lucidity rush, into 10% cdr component of frozen heart > shorter cd on ult > several spell rotations during a gank (specifically if they are overextended) 
Very long stun at max rank which stops foes from escaping, also peels enemy foes like a Nasus with a maxed out w.
Punishes over-extension severely 
Allows you to have a real presence in the early phases of the game
 with lichbane and all that cdr you take towers down reasonably, provided how tanky you are. 

**Cons**
Low damage
Reliant on your team to follow up on plays (not really if you are responding to a party in the bottom lane; 5v4, 3v3, etc)
Reliant on your team to deal satisfying dps throughout the game. 
Reliant on extracting an advantage.

replies.body: With no AP, it would probably be better to get a Trinity Force instead  of a Lich Bane. It would synergise okay with his E at least.

>
> With no AP, it would probably be better to get a Trinity Force instead  of a Lich Bane. It would synergise okay with his E at least.

good point, triforce for dmg, ibg for more peel.

Though I like your willingness to make an attempt at something like this, I don't see it being better than a full ap TF in the mid lane or even just another purpose built tank in the top lane (Maokai, Sion etc.) 
Top lane TF has a few pitfalls that its brethren in the mid lane doesn't quite suffer as much from, one being that ult range is barely enough to make midlane as a response from top, while midlane has a larger field of effectiveness for teleport ganks. Given you did say to take tele it would be a bit of a waste seeing as being played midlane he could take another offensive  or defensive spell in its place and still remain effective (not saying tele is a bad choice, but it is giving up huge amounts of lane potential). Coupling this with the fact that your damage will be extremely lackluster in compared to carry TF's one shot potential it appears to me to be a waste of the champion's capabilities. On another note, you could by all rights play Pantheon in this fashion, but for his kit in particular it makes more sense to be building full tank. From a peeling perspective I feel even if TF does have a stun, single target unreliable cc isn't what you want in a tank, falling short of point and click engage/peel that comes from champions like Maokai who bring a lot more versatility as tanks, and itemize a lot more efficiently.
TLDR; I get the idea but waste of champion potential, not really as good as real tanks and not as much pressure on the game as carry TF in mid would provide.

Because it is a TF top the gank bottom lane after you have backed becomes even more unsuspecting, after you pull off the gank you simply tp back to your tower, etc... 

The damage will be lack luster, but in turn you are able to keep allies very safe (tf w is extremely low cd max rank with 40cdr, probably lowest cd 2 second stun ability in the game) 3.5 cd after casting yellow card, 1.5 seconds later you may seek another 2 second stun card, top this with ibg constantly procing it will be very hard to get in on squishies)

full tank with only 1 ap item (lich) tf? for a start, if youre getting very little ap the ranking q before e isnt worth it. if you're pick him for lockdown,  what makes him better at this than a sion or maoki who both scale better with tank items? 
Sure, you could go RoA>Frozen heart>crd boots>lich bane>rylais (so your q and aa slow)>banshees, but then you could play maoki with the same build or tankier and do just as much damage. just because tf has a spammable stun/slow (and its his only cc) doesnt mean he's a good tank. if you want tanky AP that has/can get cc, then play Vlad/Cassiopeia with rylais or play kassadin/ryze top.
